    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        createuserid JFrame=new createuserid();
        JFrame.setVisible(true);
        dispose();

// TODO add your handling code here:
}                                        

    
      private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        String pass=new String(jPasswordField1.getPassword());
        String user=jTextField1.getText();
        try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select userid,password from user where userid='"+user+"' and password='"+pass+"';";
        ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);

        if(rs.next()){
        String passw,uid;
        passw=rs.getString("password");
        uid=rs.getString("userid");
        if (passw.equals(pass)&& uid.equals(user)){
        mainform JFrame=new mainform();
        JFrame.setVisible(true);
        dispose();
        }

        }
        else{
         JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"please enter correct password and user id");
         }
         
         }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}
         // TODO add your handling code here:
         }                                        

 

    /**
    * @param args the command line arguments
    */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {

                new login().setVisible(true);
            }
        });
    }

    private javax.swing.JTextField jTextField1;
    // End of variables declaration                   

}

    private void jButton3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
login JFrame=new login();
JFrame.setVisible(true);
dispose();
// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        
private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
lm.clear();
 try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select userid from user;";
        ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
         while(rs.next()){
String uid=rs.getString("userid");

 lm.addElement(uid);
}
 }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jList1MouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                    

        DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
          String uid=(String)jList1.getSelectedValue();
        try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from user where userid='"+uid+"';";
        
 ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
      while (rs.next()){
        String uidn,uname,dob,gen="",pass;
        long mon;

        uid=rs.getString("userid");
        uname=rs.getString("username");
        dob=rs.getString("dateofbirth");
        gen=rs.getString("gender");
        mon=rs.getLong("mobileno");
        pass=rs.getString("password");
        if(gen.equals("m"))
            jRadioButton1.setSelected(true);
        else if(gen.equals("f"))
             jRadioButton2.setSelected(true);

        jTextField1.setText(""+uid);
        jTextField2.setText(""+uname);
        jTextField3.setText(""+mon);
        jPasswordField1.setText(""+pass);
}
}catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}

          // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                   
    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
 DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
 try{
     String uidn,uname,dob,gen="",dd,mm,yy;
        long mon;
           String pass=new String(jPasswordField1.getPassword());
      mon=Long.parseLong(jTextField3.getText());
         uidn=jTextField1.getText();
        uname=jTextField2.getText();
        dd=(String)jComboBox1.getSelectedItem();
         mm=(String)jComboBox3.getSelectedItem();
          yy=(String)jComboBox2.getSelectedItem();
          dob=yy+"-"+mm+"-"+dd;

          if(jRadioButton1.isSelected())
              gen="m";
          else if(jRadioButton2.isSelected())
              gen="f";

  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="insert into user values('"+uidn+"','"+pass+"','"+uname+"','"+mon+"','"+dob+"','"+gen+"');";
        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"your user id has been created successfully");
        }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}

// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    /**
    * @param args the command line arguments
    */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            public void run() {
                new createuserid().setVisible(true);
            }
        });
    }

MAIN FORM

        jTable2.setModel(new javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel(
            new Object [][] {

            },
            new String [] {
                "CUSTOMERID", "CUSTOMERNAME", "ADDRESS", "AGE", "SEX"
            }
        ));
        jScrollPane2.setViewportView(jTable2);

        jPanel2.setBorder(javax.swing.BorderFactory.createTitledBorder(new javax.swing.border.MatteBorder(null), "ADDRESS"));

        jLabel4.setText("HOUSE NO");

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
jButton3.setEnabled(true);
        
       DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable2.getModel();
       
      
       
                
                 try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from customer;";
        
         ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
        while(rs.next()){
        String cna,sex,add;
      int age,cid;
      cna=rs.getString("customername");
        sex=rs.getString("sex");
        add=rs.getString("address");
        age=rs.getInt("age");
        cid=rs.getInt("customerid");
        model.addRow(new Object[]{cid,cna,add,age,sex});
        
        }
        
        

        }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}
        
        
        

        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         


         String cna,sex ="",add,hn,lo,di,st;
      int age,cid;
      cna=jTextField2.getText();
      
        age=Integer.parseInt(jTextField4.getText());
        cid=Integer.parseInt(jTextField1.getText());
        hn=jTextField3.getText();
        lo=jTextField5.getText();
        di=jTextField6.getText();
        
        st=(String)jComboBox1.getSelectedItem();
        add=hn+""+lo+""+di+""+st+"";

        if(jRadioButton1.isSelected())
            sex="m";
        else if(jRadioButton2.isSelected())
            sex="f";

        DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable2.getModel();

       try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="insert into customer values("+cid+",'"+cna+"','"+add+"',"+age+",'"+sex+"');";
        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
        model.addRow(new Object[]{cid,cna,add,age,sex});
        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null," one record is added");

        }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}
       
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
mainform JFrame=new mainform();
JFrame.setVisible(true);
dispose();
// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
     CUSTOMERUPDATE JFrame=new CUSTOMERUPDATE();
JFrame.setVisible(true);
dispose();// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void formWindowOpened(java.awt.event.WindowEvent evt) {                                  
jButton3.setEnabled(false);        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }

                                    .addComponent(jTextField2, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE, javax.swing.GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE)
                                    .addComponent(jLabel3))
                                .addGap(6, 6, 6)
                                .addGroup(layout.createParallelGroup(javax.swing.GroupLayout.Alignment.BASELINE)
                                    .addComponent(jTextField3, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE, javax.swing.GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE)
                                    .addComponent(jLabel4))))
                        .addPreferredGap(javax.swing.LayoutStyle.ComponentPlacement.RELATED)
                        .addGroup(layout.createParallelGroup(javax.swing.GroupLayout.Alignment.LEADING)
                            .addComponent(jScrollPane2, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE, javax.swing.GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE)
                            .addComponent(jLabel5))))
                .addGroup(layout.createParallelGroup(javax.swing.GroupLayout.Alignment.LEADING)
                    .addGroup(layout.createSequentialGroup()
                        .addGap(18, 18, 18)
                        .addComponent(jPanel1, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE, javax.swing.GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE)
                        .addPreferredGap(javax.swing.LayoutStyle.ComponentPlacement.RELATED)
                        .addComponent(jButton4))
                    .addGroup(javax.swing.GroupLayout.Alignment.TRAILING, layout.createSequentialGroup()
                        .addGap(33, 33, 33)
                        .addComponent(jButton2)
                        .addGap(18, 18, 18)
                        .addComponent(jButton3)))
                .addContainerGap(29, Short.MAX_VALUE))
        );

        pack();
    }// </editor-fold>                        

    private void jRadioButton3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                              
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                             

    private void jRadioButton3MouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                           
DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
lm.clear();
 try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select customername from customer where sex='m';";
        ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
         while(rs.next()){


     String cna=rs.getString("customername");

        lm.addElement(cna);

        }


        }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}

        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                          

    private void jRadioButton4MouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                           


        DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
        lm.clear();
 try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select customername from customer where sex='f';";
        ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
         while(rs.next()){


     String cna=rs.getString("customername");

        lm.addElement(cna);

        }


        }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}


    }                                          

    private void jRadioButton5MouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                           


        DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
        lm.clear();
 try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select customername from customer;";
        ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
         while(rs.next()){


     String cna=rs.getString("customername");

        lm.addElement(cna);

        }


        }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                          

    private void jList1MouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                    

          DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
          String cname=(String)jList1.getSelectedValue();
        try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from customer where Customername='"+cname+"';";

         ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
      if(rs.next()){
        String cna,sex,add;
      int age,cid;
      cna=rs.getString("customername");
        sex=rs.getString("sex");
        add=rs.getString("address");
        age=rs.getInt("age");
        cid=rs.getInt("customerid");
        jTextField1.setText(""+cid);
        jTextField2.setText(cna);
        jTextField3.setText(""+age);
        jTextArea1.setText(add);
        if("m".equals(sex))
            jRadioButton1.setSelected(true);
        else  if("f".equals(sex))
            jRadioButton1.setSelected(true);
}



        }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}

        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                   

    private void jButton3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         




DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();

 try{
     String sex="";
     int cid=Integer.parseInt(jTextField1.getText());
        String cna=jTextField2.getText();
        String age=jTextField3.getText();
        String add=jTextArea1.getText();
        if(jRadioButton1.isSelected())
            sex="m";
        else if(jRadioButton2.isSelected())
            sex="f";




     Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="update customer set customerid="+cid+",customername='"+cna+"',address='"+add+"',age="+age+",sex='"+sex+"'where customerid="+cid+";";
        
        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);

JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"your data has been updated ");
        }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}


        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        
    private void jList1ValueChanged(javax.swing.event.ListSelectionEvent evt) {                                    
     // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                   

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         

        DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
   int op=JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null,"do you want delete record");
   if(op==JOptionPane.YES_OPTION){
       
     }
   try{ int cid=Integer.parseInt(jTextField1.getText());
        String cna=jTextField2.getText();
        Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="Delete from customer where customerid= "+cid+" ;";
        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
        lm.removeElement(cna);
          jTextField1.setText("");
          jTextField2.setText("");
          jTextField3.setText("");
          jTextArea1.setText("");
          JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"your data has been deleted ");
      }
   catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}

        
    }                                        

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
      customer JFrame=new customer();
      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();
      // TODO add your handling code here:
    }

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         

        DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();

       try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from item;";

         ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
        while(rs.next()){
        String ina,brna,gena,col;
      int ino,size;
        ino=rs.getInt("itemno");
        ina=rs.getString("itemname");
        brna=rs.getString("brandname");
        gena=rs.getString("gamename");
        col=rs.getString("colour");
        size=rs.getInt("size");
        model.addRow(new Object[]{ino,ina,brna,gena,size,col});}
          }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}

    }                                        

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
         String ina,brna,gena,col;
      int ino,size;
      ina=jTextField2.getText();
      brna=jTextField3.getText();
      gena=jTextField4.getText();
      col=jTextField5.getText();
      ino=Integer.parseInt(jTextField1.getText());
      size=jComboBox1.getSelectedIndex();


       DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();

       try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="insert into item values("+ino+",'"+ina+"','"+brna+"','"+gena+"',"+size+",'"+col+"');";

        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
        model.addRow(new Object[]{ino,ina,brna,gena,size,col});
        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null," one record is added");


        }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}

    }                                        

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
mainform JFrame=new mainform();
      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
ITEMUPDATE JFrame=new ITEMUPDATE();
      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();// TODO add your handling code here:
    }

ITEM UPDATE FORM

/**
 *
 * @author NODE122
 */
import java.sql.*;

            }

        jButton4.setText("GET ITEM");
        jButton4.addActionListener(new java.awt.event.ActionListener() {
            public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {

        });

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
     DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
        lm.clear();
 try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select itemname from item;";
        ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
         while(rs.next()){
String ina=rs.getString("itemname");
 lm.addElement(ina);
}
 }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}


    }                                        

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         


        DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
   int op=JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null,"do you want delete record");
   if(op==JOptionPane.YES_OPTION){

     }
   try{ int ino=Integer.parseInt(jTextField1.getText());
        String ina=jTextField2.getText();
        Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="Delete from item where itemno= "+ino+" ;";
        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
        lm.removeElement(ina);
          jTextField1.setText("");
          jTextField2.setText("");
          jTextField3.setText("");
          jTextField4.setText("");
          jTextField5.setText("");
          jTextField6.setText("");
          JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"your data has been deleted ");
      }
   catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}
    }                                        

    private void jList1MouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                    


          DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();
          String iname=(String)jList1.getSelectedValue();
        try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from item where itemname='"+iname+"';";

         ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
      while (rs.next()){
        String ina,brna,gena,col;
      int ino,size;
        ina=rs.getString("itemname");
        brna=rs.getString("brandname");
        gena=rs.getString("gamename");
        col=rs.getString("colour");
        ino=rs.getInt("itemno");
        size=rs.getInt("size");
        jTextField1.setText(""+ino);
        jTextField2.setText(""+ina);
        jTextField3.setText(""+brna);
        jTextField4.setText(""+gena);
        jTextField5.setText(""+col);
        jTextField6.setText(""+size);
       }
}catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}

        
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                   

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         


        DefaultListModel lm=(DefaultListModel)jList1.getModel();

 try{
     String ina,brna,gena,col;
     int size;

     int ino=Integer.parseInt(jTextField1.getText());
         ina=jTextField2.getText();
        brna=jTextField3.getText();
       gena=jTextField4.getText();
        col=jTextField5.getText();
         size=Integer.parseInt(jTextField6.getText());



     Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="update item set itemno="+ino+",itemname='"+ina+"',brandname='"+brna+"',gamename='"+gena+"',colour='"+col+"',size="+size+" where itemno ="+ino+";";
        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"your data has been updated ");
        }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}
       
    }                                        

    private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
item JFrame=new item();
      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();
      // TODO add your handling code here:
    }

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         


         DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();

         try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from manufacturer;";

         ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
        while(rs.next()){
        String bna,add ;
      long co;
      bna=rs.getString("brandname");
        co=rs.getLong("contact");
        add=rs.getString("address");

        model.addRow(new Object[]{co,bna,add});


        }



        }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
String bna,add,hn,lo,di,st ;
      long co;
      co=Long.parseLong(jTextField4.getText());
      bna=jTextField5.getText();
      hn=jTextField1.getText();
      lo=jTextField2.getText();
      di=jTextField3.getText();
      st=(String)jComboBox1.getSelectedItem();
      add=hn+""+lo+""+di+""+st+"";




      


         DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();

       try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="insert into manufacturer values("+co+",'"+bna+"','"+add+"');";

        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
        model.addRow(new Object[]{co,bna,add});
        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null," one record is added");


        }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
mainform JFrame=new mainform();
      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

  
  private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
MANUFACTURERUPDATE JFrame=new MANUFACTURERUPDATE();

      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    /**
    * @param args the command line arguments

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();

         try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from manufacturer;";

         ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
        while(rs.next()){
        String bna,add ;
      long co;
      bna=rs.getString("brandname");
        co=rs.getLong("contact");
        add=rs.getString("address");

        model.addRow(new Object[]{co,bna,add});


        }



        }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}

             // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         


        DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();
 try{

     String add,bna;
     

     long co=Long.parseLong(jTextField1.getText());
         bna=jTextField2.getText();
        
         add=jTextArea1.getText();
        Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="update manufacturer set contact="+co+",brandname='"+bna+"',address='"+add+"' where contact ="+co+";";


        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);


JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"your data has been updated ");
        }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jTable1MouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                     

         DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();
int row=jTable1.getSelectedRow();
String click=jTable1.getModel().getValueAt(row, 0).toString();


 try{
        Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from manufacturer where contact="+click+";";
        ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
  if (rs.next()){
        String bna,add;
      long co;
        bna=rs.getString("brandname");
        add=rs.getString("address");
        co=rs.getLong("contact");

        jTextField1.setText(""+co);
        jTextField2.setText(""+bna);
        jTextArea1.setText(""+add);
 }}
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}


    }                                    

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
 DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();
   int op=JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null,"do you want delete record");
   if(op==JOptionPane.YES_OPTION){
}
   try{ 
       int row=jTable1.getSelectedRow();
       String click=jTable1.getModel().getValueAt(row, 0).toString();
        Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="Delete from manufacturer where contact= "+click+" ;";
        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
        model.removeRow(row);
          jTextField1.setText("");
          jTextField2.setText("");
          jTextArea1.setText("");

     
     JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"your data has been deleted ");
      }
   catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        


    private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
       manufacturer JFrame=new manufacturer();
      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();// TODO add your handling code here:
 // TODO add your handling code here:
    }

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         




        double am,dis = 0,ta;
        int bin;
        int mop;

        bin=Integer.parseInt(jTextField1.getText());
        am=Double.parseDouble(jTextField2.getText());
        mop=jComboBox1.getSelectedIndex();
 String mopa=(String)jComboBox1.getSelectedItem();

        switch(mop){
            case 0:
        dis= am*5/100;
        break;

        case 1:
        dis=am*10/100;
        break;

        case 2:
        dis=am*15/100;
        break;

        case 3:
        dis=am*20/100;
        break;

        }
        ta=am-dis;

        
        DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();

       try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="insert into billing values("+bin+","+am+","+dis+",'"+mopa+"',"+ta+");";

        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
        model.addRow(new Object[]{bin,am,dis,mopa,ta});
        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null," one record is added");


        }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}

       

                // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         

          DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();

          try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from billing;";
        
         ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
        while(rs.next()){

        double am,dis,ta;
        int bin;
        String mop;

      mop=rs.getString("modeofpayment");
        am=rs.getDouble("amount");
        dis=rs.getDouble("discount");
        bin=rs.getInt("billno");
        ta=rs.getDouble("totalamount");
        model.addRow(new Object[]{bin,am,dis,mop,ta});
        
        }

        }catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
mainform JFrame=new mainform();
      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
BILLINGUPDATE JFrame=new BILLINGUPDATE();

      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();// TODO add your handling code here:
    }

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         

        DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();
 try{  Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from billing;";
        ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
  while(rs.next()){
        double am,dis,ta;
        int bin;
        String mop;
        mop=rs.getString("modeofpayment");
        am=rs.getDouble("amount");
        dis=rs.getDouble("discount");
        bin=rs.getInt("billno");
        ta=rs.getDouble("totalamount");
        model.addRow(new Object[]{bin,am,dis,mop,ta});
                  }
   }
 catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
jTextField1.setEditable(false);

        DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();
 try{

     int bin;
     double am,ta,dis = 0;
  
         am=Double.parseDouble(jTextField2.getText());

int bil=Integer.parseInt(jTextField1.getText());
 String mopa=jTextField3.getText();
 if("cheque".equals(jTextField3.getText())){
     mopa="cheque";
 dis=am*5/100;}
 else if("cash".equals(jTextField3.getText())){
     mopa="cash";
 dis=am*10/100;}
 else if("credit card".equals(jTextField3.getText())){
     mopa="credit card";
 dis=am*15/100;}
 else if("debit card".equals(jTextField3.getText())){
     mopa="debit card";
 dis=am*20/100;}
 else
     JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null," please enter mode of payment in cash,credit card,debit card,cheque for discount");


ta=am-dis;


        Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="update billing set amount="+am+",discount="+dis+",modeofpayment='"+mopa+"',totalamount="+ta+" where billno="+bil+";";


        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
        
JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"your data has been updated ");
        }
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jTable1MouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                     


          DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();
int row=jTable1.getSelectedRow();
String click=jTable1.getModel().getValueAt(row, 0).toString();


 try{
        Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="select * from billing where billno="+click+";";
        ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(qry);
  if (rs.next()){
       
     int bin;
     double am,ta,dis;
String mop = "";

        bin=rs.getInt("billno");
        mop=rs.getString("modeofpayment");
        am=rs.getDouble("amount");
        ta=rs.getDouble("totalamount");
        dis=rs.getDouble("discount");
        jTextField1.setText(""+bin);
        jTextField2.setText(""+am);
        jTextField3.setText(""+mop);
        
 }}
catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         



        DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)jTable1.getModel();
   int op=JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null,"do you want delete record");
   if(op==JOptionPane.YES_OPTION){
}
   try{
       int row=jTable1.getSelectedRow();
       String click=jTable1.getModel().getValueAt(row, 0).toString();
        Class.forName("java.sql.Driver");
        Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/mnsportsshowroom","root","bsms");
        Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
        String qry="Delete from billing where billno= "+click+" ;";
        stmt.executeUpdate(qry);
        model.removeRow(row);
          jTextField1.setText("");
          jTextField2.setText("");
          jTextField3.setText("");


          JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"your data has been deleted ");
      }
   catch(Exception e){JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,e.getMessage());}// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
     billing JFrame=new billing();
      JFrame.setVisible(true);
      dispose();
      // TODO add your handling code here:
    }
